Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 1-134--Clippings ScrapbookSmall insert page 12; "Fingerprint Experts Plan State System: Would Make Rogues' Gallery Records Uniform."; Discusses a conference of fingerprint experts who met at Sing Sing to review methods that would allow identification records of State prison departments to be easily accessible when needed.; no pub info; DF 654
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Identification
